import React, {useState} from 'react' import {PageArea} from './styled' import useApi from '../../helpers/OlxAPI' import {PageContainer, PageTitle} from '../../components/MainComponents' const Page = () => { const api = useApi const [email, setEmail ] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [rememberPassword, setRememberPassword] = useState('') const [disabled, setDisabled ] = useState(false) const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() setDisabled(true) const json = await api.login(email, password) } return( Login
) } export default Page
